home-features.title: Deploy your PHP App to powerful infrastucture in a few clicks
home-features.text: Learn how Deploy Now enables easy workflow configuration for PHP frameworks like Laravel and Symfony and get to know our team.

home-hero.description: Deploy Static Sites, Single Page Applications and PHP Apps directly via GitHub Actions to IONOS' global infrastructure.

getting-started.title: Getting started
getting-started.text: Connect a repository and set up a deployment

home-samples.overline: One platform for all your projects
home-samples.title: The home for your Static Site, Single Page Application or PHP App

home-team.overline: We are the team - We are deploy now
home-team.title:
Developed just for devs:
Meet the IONOS experts behind Deploy Now

home-workflow.title: The ideal workflow for you, your team and your clients
home-workflow.text: Want to preview changes before they go live? Simply set up multiple feature branches as staging deployments. View changes live via a preview link before merging them back.

about-us.title:
Hi there!
We're the Deploy Now team.
about-us.text: Our company asked us to build a product that we’d use ourselves, so we did. Our mission is to connect the GitHub community to the powerful hosting platform that we engineered in-house.
about-us.ionos-text: Headquartered in Germany, IONOS offers web hosting, domain and cloud products in Europe and North America. IONOS manages more than 8 million customer contracts and hosts over 12 million domains in its own regional data centers. Customers in all markets have access to personal 24/7 support in their own language.
about-us.feedback-text: Got ideas, need help or missing a feature? We’re still working on Deploy Now and would love to hear what you think. Use the feedback button in the product or send an email to deploynow-support@ionos.com.

404.title: Oh no! There is nothing here.

job-offer.team-subtitle: Want to be part of the team?
job-offer.banner-subtitle: Join our team and become part of Deploy Now
job-offer.about-us-text: We are looking for frontend, middleware and fullstack developers in our Karlsruhe office to drive Deploy Now further. Why are these jobs awesome? Everything is brand new and can be shaped from the beginning. All roadmap decisions are made toghether with the devs. Work with the latest tools and technologies and enjoy our beautiful new office building right new to Karlsruhe mainstation.
